title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Mining

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mining is heavily modified by two tier 1 relics.

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Pay-to-play Mining training

Mining is heavily modified by two tier 1 relics.

  • Endless Harvest makes obtaining ore twice as fast and removes banking time.
  • Production Master is not directly beneficial to Mining training.
  • Skilling Prodigy allows players to mine more quickly due to its +12 visible level boost.

Training[edit | edit source]

Method Requirements Base xp per hour Area(s)
Rune essence 1 10k All areas
Iron 15 80k All areas
Coal 30 25k All areas
Motherlode Mine 30 50k Asgarnia✓
Gem rocks 40 88k Karamja✓
Granite 45 125k Desert✓
Volcanic Mine 50 95k Misthalin✓
Amethyst 92 25k Asgarnia✓

Pickaxes[edit | edit source]

Pickaxes cannot be made using the Smithing skill. The following tables detail common methods to obtain pickaxes in the Trailblazer League:

Pickaxe Level Level[1] How to obtain in Misthalin
Bronze pickaxe 1 1 Obtained with starting gear. May be purchased at Bob's Brilliant Axes in Lumbridge for 1 GP. Can be easily obtained from many sources.
Iron pickaxe 1 1 Pickpocket H.A.M. members, 15 Thieving.
Steel pickaxe 6 5 Pickpocket H.A.M. members, 15 Thieving.
Black pickaxe 11 10 Reward casket (easy) or rarely from reward casket (beginner).
Mithril pickaxe 21 20 Eclectic implings at level 50 Hunter or rarely from earth implings at level 36 Hunter.
Adamant pickaxe 31 30 Rock golem in the Enchanted Valley, or rarely from reward casket (medium).
Rune pickaxe 41 40 Rock golem in the Enchanted Valley. For alternatives see below.
Dragon pickaxe 61 60 Unobtainable in Misthalin. See below.
  1. ↑ The listed Attack levels are only required to wield the pickaxes, not use them.

Shops[edit | edit source]

No pickaxe shops are available in the starting region.

Region Shop Bronze
 Iron
 Steel
 Black
 Mithril
 Adamant
 Rune
Asgarnia✓ Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop 1 140 500 N/A 1300 3200 32000
Asgarnia✓ Yarsul's Prodigious Pickaxes 1 140 500 N/A 1300 3200 32000
Fremennik✓ Pickaxe-Is-Mine 1 N/A 650 N/A 1690 4160 41600
Tirannwn✓ Gwyn's Mining Emporium N/A 140 500 N/A 1300 3200 32000

Rune pickaxe[edit | edit source]

A Rune pickaxe is the best available pickaxe unless unlocking the Wilderness. A rune pickaxe can be acquired in the following ways:

Region Source
Misthalin✓ Rock golem, Fossil Island wyverns, and hard clues
Asgarnia✓ Nurmof's Pickaxe Shop, Cerberus, General Graardor
Morytania✓ Grotesque Guardians, Possessed pickaxe
Wilderness✓ Callisto, Venenatis, Vetion, Scorpia
Tirannwn✓ Gwyn's Mining Emporium shop, The Gauntlet, Possessed pickaxe
Fremennik✓ Pickaxe-Is-Mine shop

Dragon pickaxe[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Callisto470 10.75/128
Chaos Elemental305 11/256
King Black Dragon276 11/1,500
Venenatis464 10.75/128
Vet'ion454 10.75/128

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Varrock armour 4 Misthalin✓ Requires completion of the Varrock diaries.
Prospector kit Asgarnia✓ The full set, when worn, grants a 2.5% bonus Mining experience.
Expert mining gloves Asgarnia✓ Requires level 70 Mining. May be purchased for 240 unidentified minerals from Belona in the Mining guild.
Amulet of glory(4) Asgarnia✓ OR Fremennik✓ A charged amulet of glory significantly increases the speed at which a player can mine gem rocks. Also increases the chance of randomly finding uncut gems while mining. A glory can only be charged if Heroes' Quest is completed, which is auto-unlocked in the Fremennik region or can be manually completed in the Asgarnia region.
Dragon pickaxe Wilderness✓ Boosts Mining by 3. Only obtainable from Callisto, Venenatis, Vet'ion, Chaos Elemental, or King Black Dragon.
Infernal pickaxe Wilderness✓
Asgarnia✓		 Boosts Mining by 3. Requires 85 Firemaking, a dragon pickaxe, and Cerberus' smouldering stones, which may also be obtained from hellhoundsor albeit very rarely.
Crystal pickaxe Wilderness✓
Tirannwn✓		 Boosts Mining by 3. Requires a dragon pickaxe and a crystal tool seed from Zalcano. Consumes crystal shards.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (brown spice) Desert✓ Boosts Mining by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Dragon pickaxe Wilderness✓ Boosts Mining by 3. Only obtainable from Callisto, Venenatis, Vet'ion, Chaos Elemental, or the King Black Dragon.
Dwarven stout Misthalin✓ Boosts Mining by 1. Can be obtained from rock slugs at 20 Slayer. Otherwise requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 19 Cooking.
Dwarven stout(m) Morytania✓ Fremennik✓ Boosts Mining by 2. Requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 19 Cooking, more easily produced by using the stuff from Trouble Brewing.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Mining cape Asgarnia✓ Gadrin While equipped, there is a 5% chance of receiving an extra ore while mining ore up to adamantite, granting experience for both ores mined. This effect stacks with those of the Varrock armour, mining gloves, superior mining gloves, and expert mining gloves.
